meanings.definition: Larval form of a tapeworm found in the tissues of a host animal.
meanings.sent1: The vet found cysticerci in the dog's tissues during the examination.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study cysticerci to understand tapeworm development.
meanings.sent3: The cysticerci threw a party in the tissues, inviting all the tapeworm friends.
meanings.sent4: The presence of cysticerci in the tissues was a hidden danger waiting to emerge.
meanings.sent5: The image of cysticerci wriggling in the tissues haunted his dreams.
